name: Locofy Sample Project - DigiCare (Uses Bootstrap components)
description:
This sample project, DigiCare, showcases how you can convert your Figma designs into production ready front-end React code using Locofy!


Using this sample mobile-first Healthcare App design, you'll be guided on how to:

- Tag layers

- Tag UI library components

- Define UX/behaviour & responsiveness rules

- Add actions

- View a live prototype

- Export your production-ready code


Make sure to install the Locofy plugin to convert this design into production-ready code: https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1056467900248561542/


If you use Material UI or Ant Design UI Libraries in your design, you may want to check out our other sample projects here: https://www.figma.com/@locofy
